text: Carlos Armando Girón Gutiérrez (3 November 1954 — 13 January 2020) was a Mexican diver. He competed in four consecutive Summer Olympics, winning one medal at the 1980 Olympics. He was born in Mexicali, Baja California, Mexico. On 13 January 2020, Girón died from pneumonia in Mexico City at age 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Database Olympics Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic medalists for Mexico Category:Olympic silver medalists Category:Divers Category:People from Baja California (state)
title: Carlos Girón
